code: import"antd/es/card/style/css";import _Card from"antd/es/card";import React,{useEffect}from"react";import Software from"./Software";import MySoftware from"../components/MySoftware";import Nav from"../components/nav";import{Redirect,Route,Switch}from"react-router-dom";var TeacherSoftware=function TeacherSoftware(props){useEffect(function(){props.history.location.pathname==='/user/download'&&props.history.push('/user/download/mysoftware');},[props.history.location.pathname]);var tabList=[{name:'我的软件',path:'/user/download/mysoftware'},{name:'所有软件',path:'/user/download/allsoftware'}];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(_Card,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Nav,{tabList:tabList,location:props.history.location.pathname}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Switch,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{path:"/user/download/mysoftware",component:MySoftware}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Route,{path:"/user/download/allsoftware",component:Software})));};export default TeacherSoftware;
